pull.title: depends: Ignore prefix directory on OpenBSD
pull.body:
On OpenBSD, the prefix directory is named as follows:
```
$ gmake --no-print-directory -C depends print-x86_64_openbsd_prefix
x86_64_openbsd_prefix=/home/hebasto/dev/bitcoin/depends/amd64-unknown-openbsd7.6
```

This name does not match any pattern in `depends/.gitignore`.

This PR resolves this issue.

ACK 3353d4a5e9fc8887b2ebe54d49ec0675147d9d47

In openbsd 7.5, saw `git status` show `depends/arm64-unknown-openbsd7.5` as an untracked file(dir) on master, but not on the PR branch.

Also took a look at the host-platform-triplets in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/README.md to see if there were others that the `.gitignore` might me missing. Didn't see any.

utACK 3353d4a5e9fc8887b2ebe54d49ec0675147d9d47

I don't have an openbsd install to test this, but I believe you :)
